Name: Terrordrome - Reign of the Legends
About the game: Imagine a world where every scary story told to you turned out to be true, This is the world of Terrordrome where these monsters effect the real world unknown to humans who live their regular day to day life. Discover these stories in a new light with the main protagonist Alex Van Helsing as he ventures his way to take down Dracula once and for all whilst meeting new allies and enemies along the way with playable characters like Frankenstein's Monster, Bigfoot, Bloody Mary and much more like some original monsters to create one of the most unique horror crossovers using as much as we can in the general public media to avoid lawsuits. with a set roster with characters like these, expect each with a unique and interesting moveset which contrasts with each other creating a fun long lasting fighter full of bloody violence, terror and intense action. The games early access contains: 6 Playable Characters 5 Playable Stages An arcade mode Online Mode Player vs Player Player vs CPU CPU vs CPU Training Mode Options Playable Characters Frankenstein Sasquatch Alex Van Helsing Neverman Bloody Mary T.H.I.S Mr. Hyde White Lady Characters coming soon Dracula Wendigo Invisible Man Spring Heeled Jack Officially part of 2021 Yogscast Tiny Teams Festival
